welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marilao, a charming city known for its rich historical heritage and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: NORY's Panciteria
restaurants.description: NORY's Panciteria is a snack place located in Bocaue.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in Bulacan.
restaurants.address: Sta. Maria Bypass Rd, 3017 Bulacan, Bulacan

restaurants.name: Sarsa At Inihaw
restaurants.description: Sarsa At Inihaw is a bbq joint located in Bocaue.

restaurants.name: Max's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Max's Restaurant is a fried chicken joint located in Santa Maria.
restaurants.address: Governor Fortunato Halili Ave, Brgy Bagbagin, 3022 Santa Maria, Bulacan

restaurants.name: Tapsi
restaurants.description: Tapsi is a breakfast spot located in Bocaue.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, equipped with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest and oldest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours at all terminals. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
